entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, St. Alban's
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 5 except temperature rising to plus 1 along the coast.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow beginning this evening then changing to 60 percent chance of flurries after midnight. Rain along the coast late this evening and after midnight. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Rainfall amount 2 mm along the coast. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming south 30 gusting to 50 this evening then southwest 40 gusting to 60. Low minus 5 except temperature rising to plus 1 along the coast. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clearing. Temperature steady near minus 4 except low minus 9 inland.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 4 except low minus 9 inland. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 27 December 2022
